sqlMap.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, qna_title, qna_ques_content, qna_ans_content, qna_active, course_no, student_no) values (qna_no_seq.nextval, #title#, #quesContent#, #ansContent#, #active#, #course.no#, #student.no#)
sqlMap.select: select "no" as no, "title" as title, "quesContent" as quesContent, "quesDate" as quesDate, "ansContent" as ansContent, "ansRegdate" as ansRegdate, "active" as active, "student.no" as "student.no", "student.name" as "student.name", "course.name" as "course.name" from (select row_number() over (order by qna_no asc) m, A.qna_no as "no", A.qna_title as "title", A.qna_ques_content as "quesContent", A.qna_ques_date as "quesDate", A.qna_ans_content as "ansContent", A.qna_ans_regdate as "ansRegdate", A.qna_active as "active", A.student_no as "student.no", B.student_name as "student.name", C.course_name as "course.name" from qna A, student B, course C where A.student_no = B.student_no and A.course_no = C.course_no) where m >= #beginIndex# and m <= #endIndex#
sqlMap.update: update from qna set qna_active = 'N' where qna_no = #value#
sqlMap.select: select A.qna_no as no, A.qna_title as title, A.qna_ques_content as quesContent, A.qna_ques_date as quesDate, A.qna_ans_content as ansContent, A.qna_ans_regdate as ansRegdate, A.qna_active as active, A.course_no as "course.no", A.student_no as "student.no", B.course_name as "course.name", C.lecturer_name as "course.lecturer.name" from qna A, course B, lecturer C where A.course_no = B.course_no and B.lecturer_no = C.lecturer_no and A.qna_no = #value#
sqlMap.update: update qna set qna_ans_content = #ansContent#, qna_ans_regdate = sysdate where qna_no = #no#
